Room.Name: Thieve's Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a narrow crawl space, above a hole leading to a prison cell.
Room.LongDescription: You can see several criminals below you, and a black crawlway leading to the east. The stones are cold and clammy, and you can hear rats in the distance. Big rats. It's hard to make a decision as to which is worse, hungry rats or hungry prisoners. Which way to go?
